name: My Hayami-Chan
storyline: One day when you're minding your own business in front of your computer, you stumble upon an Anime you never seen before & you're some what of an anime nerd. You start watching the show and you find it entertaining, the main character reminds you of your waifu. After watching it for a few days something strange happens, the girl from the anime is climbing out of your computer screen & starts living with you!
summary: A tamagotchi-like game about having your own Anime girl.
